医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
古代 DNA 将多发性硬化症的起源追溯到 5000 年前的迁徙研究人员创建了世界上最大的古人类基因库，将基因与多发性硬化症风险联系起来，并将其起源追溯到 5000 年前的迁徙。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Ancient-DNA-traces-multiple-sclerosis-origins-to-5000-year-old-migrations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Ancient-DNA-traces-multiple-sclerosis-origins-to-5000-year-old-migrations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6adab036-cd29-4f0b-b35d-3415fa922f7d Sat, 13 Jan 2024 21:08:00 -0500 Ancient DNA traces multiple sclerosis origins to 5,000-year-old migrations
研究将压力与代谢综合征联系起来，强调炎症的作用新研究通过炎症将压力与代谢综合征联系起来，表明压力管理是改善生物健康结果的潜在策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Study-links-stress-to-metabolic-syndrome-highlights-inflammations-role.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Study-links-stress-to-metabolic-syndrome-highlights-inflammations-role.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b781222-d33e-4f28-93e1-0646d816474a Sat, 13 Jan 2024 20:44:00 -0500 Study links stress to metabolic syndrome, highlights inflammation's role
在混合政治关系中浏览新闻：研究探讨媒体对夫妻的影响政治沟通研究探讨了具有不同政治观点的夫妇如何驾驭媒体消费，揭示了管理新闻曝光和关系动态的挑战和策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Navigating-news-in-mixed-political-relationships-Study-explores-medias-impact-on- Couples.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Navigating-news-in-mixed-political-relationships-Study-explores-medias-impact-on- Couples.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0e3aae1-4685-476b-843c-b864c2b3ef4c Sat, 13 Jan 2024 20:33:00 -0500 Navigating news in mixed-political relationships: Study explores media's impact on couples
NHS 需要将非紧急治疗增加 10%，以解决大流行积压问题《柳叶刀》的分析显示，NHS 每月必须治疗至少 10% 的非紧急病例，以减少大流行引起的积压，截至 2022 年 10 月，有超过 720 万例转诊待处理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/NHS-needs-to-ramp-up-non-emergency-treatments-by-1025-to-tackle-pandemic-backlog.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/NHS-needs-to-ramp-up-non-emergency-treatments-by-1025-to-tackle-pandemic-backlog.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=462ab272-8db4-46bf-ae80-0414f09c4813 Sat, 13 Jan 2024 20:19:00 -0500 NHS needs to ramp up non-emergency treatments by 10% to tackle pandemic backlog
古代DNA揭示了特纳和雅各布氏综合症的第一例史前病例新技术增强染色体分析，古代DNA揭示了首个史前特纳综合症和雅各布氏综合症病例https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Ancient-DNA-reveals-first-prehistoric-cases-of-Turner-and-Jacobs-syndromes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Ancient-DNA-reveals-first-prehistoric-cases-of-Turner-and-Jacobs-syndromes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e28eca57-fe8d-4b49-90f8-dccbd603de12 Sat, 13 Jan 2024 20:08:00 -0500 Ancient DNA reveals first prehistoric cases of Turner and Jacob's syndromes
苏格兰 NHS 金禧心脏移植中心扩建以支持更多患者位于 NHS Golden Jubilee 的苏格兰唯一的心脏移植中心正在扩建，以支持苏格兰各地比以往更多的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Scotlands-NHS-Golden-Jubilee-heart-transplant-unit-expands-to-support-more-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Scotlands-NHS-Golden-Jubilee-heart-transplant-unit-expands-to-support-more-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99489085-d4d0-4314-afe3-c25330ec758e Sat, 13 Jan 2024 06:44:00 -0500 Scotland's NHS Golden Jubilee heart transplant unit expands to support more patients
心血管外科医生和米其林厨师联手创作《心脏外科医生的食谱》一位杰出的心脏外科医生、一位米其林星级厨师和一家全球心血管设备提供商之间前所未有的合作，推出了一本独特的、受外科手术启发的食谱书，旨在帮助外科医生将他们的技能练习从手术室带到厨房。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Cardioangio-surgeon-and-Michelin-chef-team-up-to-create-The-Heart-Surgeons-Cookbook.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Cardioangio-surgeon-and-Michelin-chef-team-up-to-create-The-Heart-Surgeons-Cookbook.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5396141f-1c30-49d0-bac3-5b07eb6f1091 Sat, 13 Jan 2024 06:40:00 -0500 Cardiovascular surgeon and Michelin chef team up to create 'The Heart Surgeon's Cookbook'
UVA研究人员加入国际联盟研究与气候相关的儿童腹泻UVA Health 研究人员加入了一个新的国际联盟，该联盟将致力于了解气候变化如何影响危险的腹泻病，这是 5 岁以下儿童死亡的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/UVA-researchers-join-international-consortium-to-study-climate-lated-childhood-diarrea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/UVA-researchers-join-international-consortium-to-study-climate-lated-childhood-diarrea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73c8c1b5-4c7c-4b10-a142-818651ce0fb2 Sat, 13 Jan 2024 06:36:00 -0500 UVA researchers join international consortium to study climate-related childhood diarrhea
对癌细胞的新分析确定了 370 个目标，可实现更智能、个性化的治疗一项新的癌细胞系统分析确定了 27 种癌症类型的 370 个候选优先药物靶点，包括乳腺癌、肺癌和卵巢癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/New-analysis-of-cancer-cells-identizes-370-targets-for-smarter-personalized-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/New-analysis-of-cancer-cells-identizes-370-targets-for-smarter-personalized-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23399aeb-d283-4234-9950-baeec259593e Sat, 13 Jan 2024 06:32:00 -0500 New analysis of cancer cells identifies 370 targets for smarter, personalized treatments
青春期胆固醇水平升高与早期心脏损伤有关心脏病是世界上第一大杀手疾病。儿童和青少年胆固醇升高和血脂异常会增加四十几岁过早死亡和二十几岁亚临床动脉粥样硬化的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Increased-cholesterol-levels-in-adolescent-linked-to-early-heart-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240113/Increased-cholesterol-levels-in-adolescent-linked-to-early-heart-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7e174c4-d375-4ef0-a855-fefb82bd1c34 Sat, 13 Jan 2024 06:27:00 -0500 Increased cholesterol levels in adolescence linked to early heart damage
